name: 2+2=Mothman
description: A game done quick for the Art is Ego jam! Decided to really feed the ego by making my first ever game! And, well, art's in the title, so, here it is, a game about drawing cryptids using numbers and various mathmatical symbols, done in a Google Doc without any art. Even the thumbnail art was a first attempt! Well, there is art, but you have to make it yourself. Maybe that'll count as playtesting. As an additional note, this was written during a colllege finals week, so, uh, please excuse the ramblings
